extendedInfo.description: NEW AD FREE VERSION!--Please note, in order to view recent games you must authenticate with windows live, therefore you must supply an email and password. If you don't feel comfortable doing this then you can continue without supplying one and still have access to all the other features.New and improved version of the old app, but it was taken down for copyright infringement (thanks Microsoft).Previous Halo 4 Service Record listing had over 20,000 downloads with a 4.64 rating with 560 reviews!Easily view your Halo 4 service record with a clean, fast interface. View your spartan armour and stats such as K/D ratio, game wins and weapon stats.New features include:- more stats added- improved layout- CSR stats- view daily, weekly and monthly challenges (now working)- recent gamesSince the app is now ad free, if you enjoy it please consider making a small donation:https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=CAK7V3N3YTURYHow to use:Simply enter your gamertag in the bar at the top and press the done/enter key, and voila, your service record should load up.New features are constantly being added, if you find any bugs or wish to request features, please feel free to email me.

reviews.comment: Excellent stats app for Halo 4 ! Very efficent, up to date and user friendly
reviews.author: Aodhan Scott

reviews.title: Halo 4 Stats
reviews.comment: Apps great I just wish you didn\'t half to login to see your recent games /: but overall its a beast app.
reviews.author: Ted Cowan

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Awesome app works very well and is one of the best of its kind in my opinion. Keep up the awesome work!
reviews.author: Joshua Michael

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: This by far is one of the best Halo stat trackers. Stat Tracker is the best but this is second in line :) keep up with this great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Would be neat if they could add a feature that displays your loadouts and unlocks as well. Not complaining though. Best halo app yet as far as function.
reviews.author: Cary Felton

reviews.title: Add more
reviews.comment: Please add all weapons and medals to look at. Also, add the other game modes. Once you do, I\'ll easier it to 5
reviews.author: hah aha

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Great app! Love it! Only thing to make it better is to show the players Spartan rather than just the default Spartan.
reviews.author: Kris Warrington

reviews.title: Widget?
reviews.comment: The widget is 5x3 this is not available for my phone it only goes up to 4x3 on my phone other than that this is a really good app
reviews.author: Mike Bohn

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good for viewing stats, but just like all other Android apps for Halo service record there is no ability to compare between your account and other players. recommend adding that as update this app would be perfect. The one on the Apple market is perfect called Fps stat tracker
reviews.author: Joshua Parker

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice app very easy to use
reviews.author: Chris Foulk

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I got this to monitor my global championship stuff but I don\'t think I\'ll be deleting this ever.
reviews.author: Julio Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It works a lot like waypoint for reach. The only reason I\'m not giving five stars is because of the fact you can\'t see a breakdown of what medals you got on your recent games. Also, if you could go back to see earlier games, it\'d be great.
reviews.author: Joseph Daniel

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Lets me see more about my stats than on the actual game. I like how i can see my Spartan and save the picture of my Spartan.
reviews.author: Cameron Stelly

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It gives me what i need to know can\'t complain
reviews.author: Zac Devinney

reviews.title: good job
reviews.comment: should make something that update the day, week, month challenges make it more awesome!!!
reviews.author: kamalrulnizam kiman

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Easy to use, everything is right where i want it to be
reviews.author: William Villanueva

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great and quick for the halotier
reviews.author: Steve Seitz

reviews.title: A good overall app that proves handy
reviews.comment: record and compare with yours
reviews.author: Drew Weber

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: So awesome, must have for halo players:))

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It has every single detail of my service record
